column6:
"THE OTHER: EVOLVE OR DIE" Part 7 (of 12),2005,12
THE SPIDER-MAN CROSSOVER EVENT OF THE DECADE CONTINUES HERE!
It's the moment you never thought you'd see, True Believer! Pushed to the brink of death at the hands of Morlun, Spider-Man finds himself poised at the final precipice. Worse, his fate is out of his hands.

32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Karl Kesel | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Paul Mounts | penciller (cover):Mike Wieringo
